mapper.select: select r.reply_no, r.board_no, r.reply_content, r.reply_date, r.member_no, r.reply_level, m.member_id from reply r join member m on r.member_no = m.member_no where board_no=#{boardNo} And reply_level=0 order by reply_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into reply(reply_no, board_no, reply_content, member_no, reply_level) values(reply_no.nextval, #{boardNo}, #{replyContent}, #{memberNo}, 0)
